transcript.title: MESSAGE TO QUEENSLAND NEWSPAPERS LIMITED FOR A SPECIAL SUPPLEMENT TO BE PUBLISHED ON 15TH OCTOBER 1963, MARKING THEIR MOVE INTO NEW ?3M PREMISES AT BOWEN HILLS, BRISBANE
transcript.content:
MESSAGE TO tUEENSLAND NEdSPAPEi1 LIMITIED FOR
* A SPECIAL SUPPLEMENT T0 BE PULISHED ON
OCTOBER 1963 MARHKINU THEIR MOVE INTO NE
Å 3M PE( ISES AT BOWEN HILLS, BRISBANE
SI congratulate Iueensland Newspapers Limited
on this significant day in their history.
In the pages of your publications in the
case of " The Courier-Mail" for 117 years is the record
of growth of a great State which year by year makes ever
Q greater oontributions to the prosperity of our nation.
The publishers, in this new venture, have
given a tangible expression of their own faith in Queensland's
future and have provided an example of substantial investment
which I hope will encourage others to follow.
I am certain that with the greater efficiency
which this new plant promises, we will see a continuation
of the service which responsible Journalism offers in a
free society. R. G. MEN'? IES
PRIME MINISTER
